page.title: 04SHOPPING IN AYLMERTON
page.content: In Aylmerton there are two shops, a Post Office and a grocer's. There is a fishmonger's van and a chip van that come through the village regularly. Outside the village, the nearest shops are in Cromer or West Runton. The grocer's shop is next to the petrol station. It is small but efficient, selling sweets, post cards, groceries, cigarettes and other every_ day items. The busiest time of the year is summer, when the tourists buy things. Most of their custom, however, comes from local people who buy mainly sweets, cigarettes, ice_creams and groceries. The fishmonger's van comes round once every week selling fresh fish. The Post Office opens every day except Sundays.
